Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the abortion views of Charlie Crist and Todd Akin are identical, without taking into account the complexities and nuances of their respective positions.

Falters at times: The claim may falter or be inconsistent in accurately representing the abortion views of Charlie Crist and Todd Akin, as it is challenging to compare their positions due to different legislative contexts.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Charlie Crist's stance on abortion has been described as both "pro-choice" and "pro-life," indicating a more complex position than the claim suggests.
